name: Bioethics
description: Moral implications of recent developments in medicine and the life sciences; related legal and social issues. Euthanasia, health care priorities, abortion, fertility control, against the background of some major ethical theories. [36L]
prerequisites: PHL101H5/ PHL102H5/ PHL103H5/ PHL105Y5/ PHL113H5 (may be taken as a corequisite) or 4.0 credits.
